activities: Pro-Link GLOBAL, Inc is an immigration services provider.  We receive copies of documents from our clients around the globe and save that information to our private servers which our employees have to log into.  No documents are allowed to be saved to the company laptops, documents are only saved to our secure private servers.  We ensure that all information is used only for the immigration purposes and is never used for any other purpose.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization and client.  The data is not manually processed.  We receive electronic copies of documents only.
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
